overview:
Stephen Chandler is a founding partner at Notion and chairman of the board, with primary responsibility for the external fundraising activities of the firm. Within portfolio companies he focuses on commercial and financial operations. He is the Notion Capital representative on the boards of Cellcrypt Limited, SelfNet Holdings Limited and Star Technology Services Limited.

Stephen is an experienced executive and corporate financier with a career spanning accountancy, investment banking and operational management within technology businesses.
